titleStmt.title: A short and profitable treatise, of lavvfull and vnlavvfull recreations and of the right vse and abuse of those that are lavvefull. Written by M. Dudley Fenner, Preacher of the Word of God in Midlebrugh [sic]. 1587.
titleStmt.author: Fenner, Dudley, 1558?-1587.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Of lavvfull and vnlavvfull recreations.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
